name: KIT109 Exam Game
description:
Exam Game for KIT109

Controls:
Click on the buttons at the bottom of the screen to move.
Just don't hit the bad stuff or fall off...

1 through 0 for level select 1-10.
Escape (esc) for main menu.

Game Specifications:

Core Functionality:
- Complete

Extra Functionality:
- Visual Style only part attempted

User Interface:
- Title Screen
- Most of the "In-game UI" added
- Time Scale added

Levels:
- Levels 1-7 Complete
- Started to try level 9 but buttons were buggy so I stopped. (not sure what happened here) They were the same as other levels.                        

Portal:
2D Pixel Art Portal Sprites by Elthen - https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-portal-sprites

Platforms, Spiky Wall, Lever, Sign Post, Heart, Ghost (Most of the sprite assets)
Platformer Art: Pixel Redux - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/platformer-art-pixel-redux

Background art:
Background Elements Redux - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/background-elements-redux

Scripts:
ResetPlayer.cs adapted from DestroyIfOffScreen.cs - KIT109 Tutorial 1 script

Font:
Bebas Neue by Ryoichi Tsunekawa - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bebas+Neue?category=Display#standard-styles
